options.systemMessage:
You are a helpful assistant.

You MUST use the Hybrid_search_tool tool to find the answer. Do not use your own knowledge.

If you are not sure what to say, then simply output "Sorry, I don't know"

assignments.name: text
assignments.value:
={{ $json.text
  .normalize("NFKC")                                               // normalize Unicode (convert presentation forms to base Arabic letters)
  .replace(/<[^>]*>/gu, ' ')                                       // remove HTML tags
  .replace(/[^\p{L}\p{N}\s\n‚Ä¢\-*()\[\]{}<>.,ÿå'"¬´¬ª‚Äú‚Äù‚Äò‚Äô]/gu, ' ')    // keep allowed chars
  .replace(/([^\p{N}])(\p{N})/gu, '$1 $2')                         // add space between letter -> number
  .replace(/(\p{N})([^\p{N}])/gu, '$1 $2')                         // add space between number -> letter
  .replace(/\d/g, d => 'Ÿ†Ÿ°Ÿ¢Ÿ£Ÿ§Ÿ•Ÿ¶ŸßŸ®Ÿ©'[d])                           // convert Western digits to Arabic-Indic
  .replace(/[ \t]+/gu, ' ')                                        // collapse multiple spaces/tabs
  .replace(/\n{3,}/g, '\n\n')                                      // collapse 3+ newlines to 2
  .replace(/[ \t]*([‚Ä¢\-*])\s*/g, '\n$1 ')                          // ensure bullets start on a new line
  .replace(/,/g, 'ÿå')                                              // unify English comma to Arabic
  .replace(/ +\./g, '.')                                           // remove spaces before dot
  .replace(/ \ÿå/g, 'ÿå')                                            // remove spaces before Arabic comma
  .replace(/([ÿå.])([^\s])/g, '$1 $2')                              // ensure space after comma or dot
  .trim()
}}
